txt.en: Shields, spears, and saddles can be found throughout the refugees' small camp north of Marton.\n\nYou should collect spears, shields, and saddles for the journey, and ready the horses.
The refugees' horses can be found at the head of their camp, north of Marton.\n\nYou should saddle the horses to ready them for the dangerous journey to Helm's Deep.
Agelwyn is in the refugees' small camp in the ravine north of Marton.\n\nYou should speak with Agelwyn.

'You work quickly, [placeholder]! I had hoped you would take longer, for I dread this next step.\n\n'I'll now see if I have what it takes to motivate my people. I cannot delay any longer. I hope you will come with us, my friend! You and Elstan strengthen my will.'
Agelwyn has asked you to ready the horses for travel, and to gather the weapons and shields for delivery to Helm's Deep.

'I suppose we must make ready now. Would you be so kind as to ready the horses and gather anything that we might need for our journey?\n\n'We must travel light, but I expect some spears and shields will come in handy. If we do not need them, the guardians of the Hornburg will want them.'
Gathered a bundle of weapons and spears ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
